function.name: aggregate
function.title: Aggregate
function.summary: Create aggregate summaries by a grouping variable

param.name: data
param.description: The data to aggregate over, usually an array or a table

param.name: by
param.description: The grouping variable, if data is an array then an equal length array, if data is a table then the name of the grouping column/s.

param.name: summaries
param.description: An object with properties representing the name and a string to evaluate

return.description: A table of summaries by group

example.description: Get the minimum and sum of values in an array using another array to group
